text: Saint-Étienne-des-Grès/Hydravion Adventure Water Aerodrome is located on the Saint-Maurice River, southeast of Saint-Boniface, Quebec, Canada on the Saint- Maurice River. ==References== Category:Registered aerodromes in Mauricie Category:Seaplane bases in Quebec
title: Saint-Étienne-des-Grès/Hydravion Adventure Water Aerodrome
